pay TV.translation[0].definitions[0].def: television channels that you must pay to watch
pay TV.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a system in which customers pay for the length of time they watch a particular television programme or CHANNEL
pay TV.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Pay TV will be delivered on at least four channels.
Time Warner dominates the pay TV market with more than 20 million subscribers.
